overclocks.name: Composite Drums
overclocks.description: Lighter-weight materials mean you can carry even more ammo!

overclocks.name: Splintering Shells
overclocks.description: Specially designed shells splinter into smaller pieces, increasing the splash damage range.

overclocks.name: Carpet Bomber
overclocks.description: A few tweaks here and there, and the autocannon can now shoot HE rounds! Direct damage is lower, but the increased splash damage and range lets you saturate an area like no other weapon can.

overclocks.name: Combat Mobility
overclocks.description: Fancy custom ammo drums improve weapon balance, making it more accurate and easier to handle on the move while the improved feed motor increases the speed with which the max fire rate is reached. All this, however, comes at the cost of magazine capacity.

overclocks.name: Big Bertha
overclocks.description: Extensive tweaks give a huge bump in raw damage at the cost of ammo capacity and fire rate.

overclocks.name: Neurotoxin Payload
overclocks.description: Channel your inner war criminal by mixing some neurotoxin into the explosive compound. The rounds deal less direct damage and splash damage, but affected bugs move slower and take lots of damage over time.
